properties.property: select TASK.ID_ from act_ru_execution exec left join act_ru_task task on exec.PROC_INST_ID_ = task.PROC_INST_ID_ where EXEC.BUSINESS_KEY_ = ?

SELECT *
FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST A
WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL
AND A.PROC_INST_ID_ = ?
ORDER BY A.START_TIME_ ,A.END_TIME_
SELECT O.ORG_TREE_LEVEL FROM TD_SM_USER U, TD_SM_ORGUSER OU, TD_SM_ORGANIZATION O WHERE U.USER_ID = OU.USER_ID AND OU.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID AND U.USER_NAME = ?

SELECT N.NODE_NAME AS ACTNAME, N.NODE_KEY AS ACTID, T.CANDIDATE_USERS_ID AS CANDIDATENAME, T.CANDIDATE_USERS_NAME AS REALNAME, T.BUSINESS_ID AS ORGID, A.DURATION_NODE / 1000 / 60 / 60 AS NODEWORKTIME, A.BUSINESS_ID AS ORGID, A.IS_VALID AS ISVALID, A.IS_EDIT AS ISEDIT, A.IS_AUTO AS ISAUTO, A.IS_RECALL AS ISRECALL, A.NODE_DESCRIBE AS NODEDESCRIBE, A.IS_EDITAFTER AS ISEDITAFTER, A.TASK_URL AS TASKURL, A.IS_DISCARD AS ISDISCARD, A.IS_COPY AS ISCOPY, A.IS_CANCEL AS ISCANCEL, A.IS_AUTOAFTER AS ISAUTOAFTER, A.IS_MULTI AS ISMULTI, A.IS_SEQUENTIAL AS ISSEQUENTIAL, A.BUSSINESSCONTROLCLASS AS BUSSINESSCONTROLCLASS
FROM TD_WF_ACTIVITI_NODE_INFO N LEFT JOIN TD_WF_CONTROLPARAM A ON A.NODE_ID = N.ID LEFT JOIN TD_WF_ACTIVITI_NODE_CANDIDATE T ON T.NODE_ID = N.ID
AND T.BUSINESS_TYPE = #[businessType]
WHERE N.NODE_TYPE = 'userTask' AND N.PROCESS_KEY = #[processKey]
#if($userLevel) AND T.BUSINESS_ID in (#foreach($org in $userLevel) #if($velocityCount == 0) #[userLevel[$velocityCount]] #else ,#[userLevel[$velocityCount]] #end #end) #end
ORDER BY N.ORDER_NUM

SELECT A.NODE_KEY AS ACTID, A.NODE_NAME AS ACTNAME, A.DURATION_NODE / 1000 / 60 / 60 AS NODEWORKTIME, A.IS_VALID AS ISVALID, A.IS_EDIT AS ISEDIT, A.IS_AUTO AS ISAUTO, A.IS_RECALL AS ISRECALL, A.NODE_DESCRIBE AS NODEDESCRIBE, A.IS_EDITAFTER AS ISEDITAFTER, A.TASK_URL AS TASKURL, A.IS_DISCARD AS ISDISCARD, A.IS_COPY AS ISCOPY, A.IS_CANCEL AS ISCANCEL, A.IS_AUTOAFTER AS ISAUTOAFTER, A.IS_MULTI AS ISMULTI, A.IS_SEQUENTIAL AS ISSEQUENTIAL, A.BUSSINESSCONTROLCLASS AS BUSSINESSCONTROLCLASS
FROM TD_WF_NODE_WORKTIME A WHERE A.NODE_TYPE = 'userTask' AND A.PROCESS_ID = ? AND A.PROCESS_KEY = ?

SELECT A.NODE_KEY AS ACTID, A.NODE_NAME AS ACTNAME, A.DURATION_NODE / 1000 / 60 / 60 AS NODEWORKTIME A.TASK_URL AS TASKURL
FROM TD_WF_NODE_WORKTIME A WHERE A.NODE_TYPE = 'userTask' AND A.PROCESS_ID = ? AND A.PROCESS_KEY = ?

SELECT B.ID_, B.REV_, B.TYPE_, B.NAME_, B.EXECUTION_ID_, B.PROC_INST_ID_, B.TASK_ID_, B.BYTEARRAY_ID_, B.DOUBLE_, B.LONG_, B.TEXT_, B.TEXT2_ FROM ACT_RU_VARIABLE B WHERE B.PROC_INST_ID_ = ? ORDER BY B.NAME_
SELECT * FROM ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I WHERE 1=1 and I.TYPE_ = 'candidate' and I.TASK_ID_=? and I.USER_ID_=?

SELECT A.ENTRUST_USER, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, B.PROCDEF_ID, A.CREATE_USER FROM TD_WF_ENTRUST A LEFT JOIN TD_WF_ENTRUST_PROC_RELATION B ON A.ID = B.ENTRUST_ID WHERE A.STS = '有效' AND A.ENTRUST_USER = ? AND (B.PROCDEF_ID = ? OR B.PROCDEF_ID IS NULL) AND A.START_DATE <= ? AND A.END_DATE >= ?

SELECT A.ID_, A.REV_, A.EXECUTION_ID_, A.PROC_INST_ID_, A.PROC_DEF_ID_, A.NAME_, A.PARENT_TASK_ID_, A.DESCRIPTION_, A.TASK_DEF_KEY_, A.OWNER_, A.ASSIGNEE_, A.DELEGATION_, A.PRIORITY_, A.CREATE_TIME_ , A.DUE_DATE_, A.SUSPENSION_STATE_ FROM ACT_RU_TASK A WHERE A.Id_ = ?

SELECT COUNT(*) as tasknum FROM ( -- 未签收任务 SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM ACT_RU_TASK A INNER JOIN ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I ON I.TASK_ID_ = A.ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF B ON B.ID_ = A.PROC_DEF_ID_
WHERE A.ASSIGNEE_ IS NULL and I.TYPE_ = 'candidate' and I.USER_ID_ = #[assignee]
#if($processKey && !$processKey.equals("")) AND B.KEY_ = #[processKey] #end
union
-- 签收任务 SELECT A.* FROM ACT_RU_TASK A LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF B ON B.ID_ = A.PROC_DEF_ID_ WHERE a.ASSIGNEE_ = #[assignee]
#if($processKey && !$processKey.equals("")) AND B.KEY_ = #[processKey] #end
) A

SELECT A.ENTRUST_USER, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, B.PROCDEF_ID, A.CREATE_USER FROM TD_WF_ENTRUST A LEFT JOIN TD_WF_ENTRUST_PROC_RELATION B ON A.ID = B.ENTRUST_ID WHERE A.STS ='有效' and a.entrust_user = ?

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( -- 未签收 SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM ACT_RU_TASK A
INNER JOIN ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I ON I.TASK_ID_ = A.ID_ left join act_re_procdef c on c.id_ = A.proc_def_id_
WHERE a.ASSIGNEE_ is null AND I.TYPE_ = 'candidate'
#if($processKey && !$processKey.equals("")) AND c.KEY_ = #[processKey] #end
-- 委托关系 #if($entrustList && $entrustList.size()>0) and ( #foreach($WfEntrust in $entrustList) #if($velocityCount == 0) (I.USER_ID_ = #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->create_user]
#if($WfEntrust.start_date && !$WfEntrust.start_date.equals("")) AND A.CREATE_TIME_ >= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->start_date] #end
#if($WfEntrust.end_date && !$WfEntrust.end_date.equals("")) AND A.CREATE_TIME_ <= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->end_date] #end
#if($WfEntrust.procdefId && !$WfEntrust.procdefId.equals("")) AND C.KEY_ = #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->procdefId] #end ) #else OR (I.USER_ID_ = #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->create_user]
#if($WfEntrust.start_date && !$WfEntrust.start_date.equals("")) AND A.CREATE_TIME_ >= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->start_date] #end
#if($WfEntrust.end_date && !$WfEntrust.end_date.equals("")) AND A.CREATE_TIME_ <= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->end_date] #end
#if($WfEntrust.procdefId && !$WfEntrust.procdefId.equals("")) AND C.KEY_ = #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->procdefId] #end ) #end #end ) #end
union
-- 签收任务 SELECT A.* FROM ACT_RU_TASK A left join act_re_procdef c on c.id_ = A.proc_def_id_
WHERE 1=1
#if($processKey && !$processKey.equals("")) AND c.KEY_ = #[processKey] #end
#if($entrustList && $entrustList.size()>0) and ( #foreach($WfEntrust in $entrustList) #if($velocityCount == 0) (a.ASSIGNEE_ = #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->create_user]
#if($WfEntrust.start_date && !$WfEntrust.start_date.equals("")) AND A.CREATE_TIME_ >= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->start_date] #end
#if($WfEntrust.end_date && !$WfEntrust.end_date.equals("")) AND A.CREATE_TIME_ <= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->end_date] #end
#if($WfEntrust.procdefId && !$WfEntrust.procdefId.equals("")) AND C.KEY_ = #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->procdefId] #end
) #else OR (a.ASSIGNEE_ = #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->create_user]
#if($WfEntrust.start_date && !$WfEntrust.start_date.equals("")) AND A.CREATE_TIME_ >= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->start_date] #end
#if($WfEntrust.end_date && !$WfEntrust.end_date.equals("")) AND A.CREATE_TIME_ <= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->end_date] #end
#if($WfEntrust.procdefId && !$WfEntrust.procdefId.equals("")) AND C.KEY_ = #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->procdefId] #end
) #end #end ) #end
) a

-- taskState签收状态字段 1 未签收 2 签收 SELECT DISTINCT 1 AS TASKSTATE, B.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS BUSINESSKEY, B.START_USER_ID_ AS SENDER, C.NAME_ AS TITLE, A.ID_ AS TASKID, A.PROC_INST_ID_ AS INSTANCEID, A.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS DEFID, A.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS TASKDEFKEY, A.CREATE_TIME_ AS CREATETIME, C.KEY_ AS PROCESSKEY, A.SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS SUSPENSIONSTATE, NULL AS FROMUSER, D.TASK_URL AS TASKURL
FROM ACT_RU_TASK A
INNER JOIN ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I ON I.TASK_ID_ = A.ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_PROCINST B ON B.PROC_INST_ID_ = A.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF C ON C.ID_ = B.PROC_DEF_ID_ INNER JOIN TD_WF_NODE_WORKTIME D ON D.PROCESS_ID = b.PROC_INST_ID_ AND D.NODE_KEY = A.TASK_DEF_KEY_
WHERE a.ASSIGNEE_ is null AND I.TYPE_ = 'candidate' AND I.USER_ID_ = #[assignee]
#if($processKey && !$processKey.equals("")) AND c.KEY_ = #[processKey] #end
UNION
SELECT 2 AS TASKSTATE, B.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS BUSINESSKEY, B.START_USER_ID_ AS SENDER, C.NAME_ AS TITLE, A.ID_ AS TASKID, A.PROC_INST_ID_ AS INSTANCEID, A.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS DEFID, A.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS TASKDEFKEY, A.CREATE_TIME_ AS CREATETIME, C.KEY_ AS PROCESSKEY, A.SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS SUSPENSIONSTATE, E.FROM_USER AS FROMUSER, D.TASK_URL AS TASKURL FROM ACT_RU_TASK A
LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_PROCINST B ON B.PROC_INST_ID_ = A.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF C ON C.ID_ = B.PROC_DEF_ID_ LEFT JOIN TD_WF_NODE_CHANGEINFO E ON A.ID_ = E.TASKID AND A.ASSIGNEE_ = E.TO_USER INNER JOIN TD_WF_NODE_WORKTIME D ON D.PROCESS_ID = b.PROC_INST_ID_ AND D.NODE_KEY = A.TASK_DEF_KEY_ where 1 = 1 AND a.ASSIGNEE_ = #[assignee]
#if($processKey && !$processKey.equals("")) AND c.KEY_ = #[processKey] #end
ORDER BY CREATETIME DESC

SELECT DISTINCT 1 AS TASKSTATE, B.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS BUSINESSKEY, B.START_USER_ID_ AS SENDER, C.NAME_ AS TITLE, A.ID_ AS TASKID, A.PROC_INST_ID_ AS INSTANCEID, A.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS DEFID, A.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS TASKDEFKEY, A.CREATE_TIME_ AS CREATETIME, C.KEY_ AS PROCESSKEY, A.SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS SUSPENSIONSTATE, NULL AS FROMUSER, D.TASK_URL AS TASKURL from ACT_RU_TASK a
INNER JOIN ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I ON I.TASK_ID_ = A.ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_PROCINST B ON B.PROC_INST_ID_ = A.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF C ON C.ID_ = B.PROC_DEF_ID_ INNER JOIN TD_WF_NODE_WORKTIME D ON D.PROCESS_ID = b.PROC_INST_ID_ AND D.NODE_KEY = A.TASK_DEF_KEY_
WHERE a.ASSIGNEE_ is null and I.TYPE_ = 'candidate'
#if($processKey && !$processKey.equals("")) AND c.KEY_ = #[processKey] #end
-- 委托关系 #if($entrustList && $entrustList.size()>0) and ( #foreach($WfEntrust in $entrustList) #if($velocityCount == 0) (I.USER_ID_ = #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->create_user]
#if($WfEntrust.start_date && !$WfEntrust.start_date.equals("")) AND a.CREATE_TIME_ >= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->start_date] #end
#if($WfEntrust.end_date && !$WfEntrust.end_date.equals("")) AND a.CREATE_TIME_ <= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->end_date] #end
) #else OR (I.USER_ID_ = #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->create_user]
#if($WfEntrust.start_date && !$WfEntrust.start_date.equals("")) AND a.CREATE_TIME_ >= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->start_date] #end
#if($WfEntrust.end_date && !$WfEntrust.end_date.equals("")) AND a.CREATE_TIME_ <= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->end_date] #end
) #end #end ) #end
union
-- 已签收任务 select 2 as TASKSTATE, B.Business_Key_ as BUSINESSKEY, b.start_user_id_ as SENDER, c.name_ as TITLE, a.ID_ as TASKID, a.PROC_INST_ID_ as INSTANCEID, a.PROC_DEF_ID_ as DEFID, a.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as TASKDEFKEY, a.CREATE_TIME_ AS CREATETIME, c.key_ as PROCESSKEY, a.suspension_state_ as SUSPENSIONSTATE, a.ASSIGNEE_ as FROMUSER, D.TASK_URL AS TASKURL from ACT_RU_TASK a
LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_PROCINST B ON B.Proc_Inst_Id_ = a.Proc_Inst_Id_ left join act_re_procdef c on c.id_ = b.proc_def_id_ INNER JOIN TD_WF_NODE_WORKTIME D ON D.PROCESS_ID = b.PROC_INST_ID_ AND D.NODE_KEY = A.TASK_DEF_KEY_ where 1 = 1
#if($processKey && !$processKey.equals("")) AND c.KEY_ = #[processKey] #end
#if($entrustList && $entrustList.size()>0) and ( #foreach($WfEntrust in $entrustList) #if($velocityCount == 0) (a.ASSIGNEE_ = #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->create_user]
#if($WfEntrust.start_date && !$WfEntrust.start_date.equals("")) AND A.CREATE_TIME_ >= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->start_date] #end
#if($WfEntrust.end_date && !$WfEntrust.end_date.equals("")) AND A.CREATE_TIME_ <= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->end_date] #end
) #else OR (a.ASSIGNEE_ = #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->create_user]
#if($WfEntrust.start_date && !$WfEntrust.start_date.equals("")) AND A.CREATE_TIME_ >= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->start_date] #end
#if($WfEntrust.end_date && !$WfEntrust.end_date.equals("")) AND A.CREATE_TIME_ <= #[entrustList[$velocityCount]->end_date] #end
) #end #end ) #end
ORDER BY CREATETIME DESC

SELECT A.ID_ AS TASKID, B.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS BUSINESSKEY, A.PROC_INST_ID_ AS INSTANCEID, A.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS DEFID, A.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS TASKDEFKEY, A.CREATE_TIME_ AS CREATETIME, C.IS_RECALL AS ISRECALL, C.IS_DISCARD AS ISDISCARD, C.IS_CANCEL AS ISCANCEL
FROM ACT_RU_TASK A LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_EXECUTION B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = B.PROC_INST_ID_ left join TD_WF_NODE_WORKTIME c on a.proc_inst_id_ = c.process_id and a.task_def_key_ = c.node_key WHERE A.Id_ = ?

SELECT A.ID_ AS TASKID, B.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS BUSINESSKEY, A.PROC_INST_ID_ AS INSTANCEID, A.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS DEFID, A.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS TASKDEFKEY, A.CREATE_TIME_ AS CREATETIME, C.IS_RECALL AS ISRECALL, C.IS_DISCARD AS ISDISCARD, C.IS_CANCEL AS ISCANCEL
FROM ACT_RU_TASK A LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_EXECUTION B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = B.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN TD_WF_NODE_WORKTIME C ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = C.PROCESS_ID AND A.TASK_DEF_KEY_ = C.NODE_KEY WHERE A.PROC_INST_ID_=?

-- 转办关系 SELECT A.ID_, A.PROC_DEF_ID_, A.TASK_DEF_KEY_, A.PROC_INST_ID_, A.EXECUTION_ID_, A.PARENT_TASK_ID_, A.NAME_, A.DESCRIPTION_, A.OWNER_ AS ASSIGNEE_, B.TO_USER, A.START_TIME_, A.CLAIM_TIME_, B.CHANGETIME AS END_TIME_, A.DURATION_, B.DELEGATEREMARK AS DELETE_REASON_, A.DURATION_NODE, A.ADVANCESEND, A.OVERTIMESEND, A.ALERTTIME, A.OVERTIME, A.NOTICERATE, A.IS_CONTAIN_HOLIDAY
FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST A
RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_NODE_CHANGEINFO B ON B.TASKID = A.ID_
WHERE A.PROC_INST_ID_ = ?

SELECT A.ID_, A.PROC_INST_ID_, A.BUSINESS_KEY_, A.PROC_DEF_ID_, A.START_TIME_, A.END_TIME_, A.DURATION_, A.START_USER_ID_, A.DELETE_REASON_, B.KEY_ FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF B ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = B.ID_ WHERE A.BUSINESS_KEY_ = ?

SELECT A.ID_, A.PROC_INST_ID_, A.BUSINESS_KEY_, A.PROC_DEF_ID_, A.START_TIME_, A.END_TIME_, A.DURATION_, A.START_USER_ID_, A.DELETE_REASON_, B.KEY_ FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF B ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = B.ID_ WHERE A.PROC_INST_ID_ = ?
SELECT T.ACT_ID_, T.ACT_NAME_ FROM ACT_HI_ACTINST T WHERE T.ACT_TYPE_ = 'userTask' AND T.PROC_INST_ID_ = ? ORDER BY T.START_TIME_
